title: The son of Carson: Muslims worship "the God of the Arabian Moon "?
subtitle: An article that distorted the reputation of American Muslims was a viral e-mail forward for at least a decade and was not created with the former presidential candidate Dr. Ben Carson.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A viral e-mail claiming that Muslims cannot be good Americans because they worship "the God of the Moon" is a quote from the candidate of the former president of the Gob Party (Ben Carson).
